text: Ján Hatok (born 11 July 1990) is a Slovak professional footballer who plays for 1. FC Tatran Prešov in 3. Liga East as a right-back. ==Club career== Hatok made his Fortuna Liga debut for Pohronie against Slovan Bratislava on 20 July 2019FK POHRONIE Žiar nad Hronom Dolná Ždaňa - ŠK Slovan Bratislava futbal 20.07.2019, futbalnet.sk ==References== ==External links== * Futbalnet profile * * Fortuna Liga profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Prešov Category:Slovak footballers Category:Slovak expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:1. title: Ján Hatok
